column1: Odovacar was the son of [[Herugar Bolger]] and [[Jessamine Boffin]]. He became head of the family after his father's death. Odovacar married [[Rosamunda Took]], and had two children: [[Fredegar Bolger
column3: Estella]]. They were all present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App
IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref> It was the name of [[wikipedia:Odoacer
column4: a legendary germanic king of Rome]].
